description: Enable AI assistants to search, play, and control Spotify tracks and playlists seamlessly. Access your Spotify playback devices, currently playing track info, and manage playlists directly through AI interactions. Enhance your music experience by integrating Spotify controls into your AI workflows.

capabilities.name: spotify-search
capabilities.description: Search for tracks on Spotify by query (artist, track name, etc.)

capabilities.name: spotify-play
capabilities.description: Play a specific track by ID or URI

capabilities.name: spotify-playlists
capabilities.description: Get a list of the user's Spotify playlists

capabilities.name: spotify-playlist-tracks
capabilities.description: Get tracks from a specific playlist

capabilities.name: spotify-play-playlist
capabilities.description: Play a specific playlist (with optional shuffle)

capabilities.name: spotify-search-and-play
capabilities.description: Search for a track and play the top result

capabilities.name: spotify-find-playlist
capabilities.description: Find a playlist by name and play it (with optional shuffle)
